game2048Pop.selectDifficulty: Select the difficulty level and start the game on the start screen.
game2048Pop.useArrows: Use the arrow keys on your keyboard to move tiles on the board up, down, left, or right.
game2048Pop.combineTiles: When two tiles of the same value collide during a move, they will combine into one tile with the value being the sum of these two tiles.
game2048Pop.newTile: After each move, a new tile with a value of 2 or 4 appears in a random empty spot on the board.
game2048Pop.winGame: You win the game when you create a tile with the number 2048.
game2048Pop.loseGame: The game ends in a loss when there are no more free spaces on the board and no moves left that could combine tiles.
